CPhI Worldwide es la feria comercial más: CPhI Worldwide is the world's largest trade fair. Every part of the pharmaceutical production chain is represented here, from biopharmaceuticals, outsourcing, and packaging to APIs, machinery, and ingredients.
CPHI BARCELONA, el renombrado evento far: CPHI BARCELONA, the renowned global pharmaceutical event, will take place from October 24 to 26, 2023, at Fira Barcelona Gran Via, Spain. Building on its legacy of excellence, this year's event promises to bring together suppliers, innovators, and professionals from the pharmaceutical industry in an exceptional environment that combines the best of in-person and online experiences. CPHI creates connections and inspires collaborations in the global pharmaceutical community. This year, CPHI Barcelona presents The Start-Up Market, a dedicated space in Hall 3 of Fira Barcelona, where emerging companies, innovators, and small businesses in the industry can showcase their exciting new products and solutions. The Start-Up Market is the place to visit and discover new innovations and connect with industry leaders. Eligible companies classified as startups and active in the pharmaceutical, biopharmaceutical, digital, or medical device sectors can exhibit. The market space offers various benefits, including promotion as a featured event, access to mentors for startups, and an exclusive rest area for startup networking.
MEDICA Düsseldorf (Alemania) - Foro Mund: MEDICA Düsseldorf (Germany) - World Forum for Medicine
MEDICA es la feria comercial líder mundi: MEDICA is the world's leading trade fair for the medical sector, where the latest innovations in medical technology are presented, attracting thousands of visitors from around the world year after year.

MEDICA is the world's leading trade fair for the medical sector where the latest innovations in medical technology, medical imaging, information technologies, laboratory and diagnostic equipment, physiotherapy equipment, and medical products are presented. With more than 6,000 exhibitors from 70 countries and visitors from around the world, MEDICA is one of the largest global medical fairs that has been firmly established in the calendars of experts for over 40 years. MEDICA is held simultaneously with COMPAMED, the leading trade fair for suppliers of medical technology, offering a wide range of high-quality medical technology components, services, and equipment. The comprehensive program of top-level forums and conferences presented at MEDICA/COMPAMED provides the perfect complement to stay updated on the latest developments and trends in the medical sector. MEDICA, as the most important fair in the healthcare and medical technology industry worldwide, offers the opportunity to discover the latest products and technologies in the sector, learn from experts about the latest advancements and trends, and establish new business contacts by networking with other professionals in the field.

CMEF es una exposición de equipamiento m: CMEF is a medical equipment exhibition that connects international brands with healthcare professionals and global distributors, facilitating the presentation of innovative products and collaborations in the manufacturing and regulation of medical equipment.
La Feria Internacional de Equipamiento M: The China International Medical Equipment Fair (CMEF), a medical equipment exhibition, brings together international medical equipment brands to connect with distributors, resellers, manufacturers, doctors, regulators, and globally licensed government agencies. It showcases innovative products and solutions newly arrived on the global market, establishes partnerships with local and international distributors, collaborates in manufacturing in Southeast Asia and beyond, learns how to navigate the complexity of regulated markets, and expands your network through our online and in-person meeting concierge service at CMEF.
